plot: Bala Gau Kashi Angaai is a Marathi movie released in 1977. The movie has been produced by M.S.Salvi and directed by Kamlakar Torne. The plot is based on love, sacrifice and the extent one would go to for a friend.
title: Bala Gau Kashi Angai
plot_es: Bala Gau Kashi Angaai is a Marathi movie released in 1977. The movie has been produced by M.S.Salvi and directed by Kamlakar Torne. The plot is based on love, sacrifice and the extent one would go to for a friend.
